channel.title: clean code on Cemal Önder
channel.description: Recent content in clean code on Cemal Önder

item.title: Welcome Back Clean Code
item.description: I recently read an article from Dan Abramov who is the creator of Redux. Even if I agree his article point: Don’t be a clean code zealot. Clean code is not a goal. It’s an attempt to make some sense out of the immense complexity of systems we’re dealing with. I don’t agree how misleading his article title and how not descriptive his example. Because this kind of titles “Goodbye Clean Code” gives power to another kind of zealots who hates some Software Principles or hates someone around him mentioning this kind of principles.
